0.description: Make it possible to install the Dashboard locally

1.description: Include the pre-release versions in the latest firmware versions widget.

2.description: Show the temperature in the Weather Widget in Fahrenheit as well

3.description: Option for the Clock Widget to be in Digital/Analog format

4.description: Add a widget that shows a webcam stream from OctoPrint

5.description: Make the tile layout customisable (So we can combine some or split others. So we can choose which widget is in which tile)

6.description: Add a widget that shows Google Calendar items.

7.description: Possibility to provide toggles for what appears on the dashboard? Enabling/disabling widgets allows users to customize the dashboard space

8.description: An icon or link in the printer widget that launches a new tab and goes to the OctoPrint interface.

9.description: The ability to select which printer(s) show up on the dashboard. With the Current restrictions, I have to remove machines to get control which ones are listed.

10.description: On the print jobs page, have a total for all jobs shown/all jobs known for the time and filament.

11.description: A bar graph that shows hours/month (filament/month) printed, total and for each printer
